name: pattern-scanner
description: Scans latest git changes for TODO, mock, compatibility and placeholder patterns
command: git diff --cached --name-only 2>/dev/null | head -20 | while read -r file; do [ -f "$file" ] && git diff --cached "$file" 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^\+' | grep -v '^\+\+\+' | grep -iE '(TODO|FIXME|HACK|XXX|TEMP|mock|stub|fake|dummy|placeholder|compat|legacy|deprecated|fallback|polyfill|shim|not.implemented|unimplemented|noop|no-?op|workaround|kludge)' | head -10; done | if grep .; then echo && echo '⚠️  Found patterns that may need attention in staged changes'; exit 0; else exit 0; fi
